description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry Buttermilk Scones recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Raspberry Buttermilk Scones Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15-18 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve warm with thick cream or butter and extra raspberries.
